title: This 3-year sea cruise around the world seems back on track — after controversy and a price hike
description: The Life at Sea cruise around the world aims to last 36 months and visit more than 100 countries.

title: BlackRock names Saudi Aramco CEO Amin H. Nasser to board
The war against inflation is a long way away from being won
description: Despite recent signs that inflation is cooling, the fight to bring down the meteoric price increases of the past three years is far from over.

title: FDA approves AstraZeneca, Sanofi shot that protects infants and toddlers against RSV
description: RSV is the leading cause of hospitalization among children less than a year old, according to scientists.

title: Help! I'm so tired of doing my team's busy work
description: Work It Out answers a question from an employee who's tired of taking on their team's busy work in what was supposed to be a temporary assignment.

title: More Americans are moving to Spain — and paying high prices for real estate
description: The expat American population in Spain jumped 13% from 2019 to 2021 and are the foreign demographic paying the second-highest amount for living space.

title: U.S. lawmakers extend social media investigation to Meta's Threads
description: The letter from House Judiciary Chair Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, is an indication of the added spotlight Meta's newest product could bring to the company.

title: Wheat prices surge after Russia axes grain deal. And it's not good news for the world's food supply
description: Analysts described the demise of the Black Sea Grain Initiative as both an inevitable setback and a blow to markets.

title: Ford cuts prices on its electric F-150 Lightning pickups by as much as $10,000
description: Ford said lower mineral costs and an expected production boost allowed it to cut the electric truck's prices.

title: India will account for 20% of Apple's user growth over the next five years, Morgan Stanley estimates
description: Morgan Stanley analysts increased their price target and said that India could create $40 billion in revenue for Apple over the next decade.

title: Italy warns ‘peak of the heat is coming,’ issues red alert for 16 cities as temperatures soar
description: Italy's cities of Rome, Florence and Bologna are among some of the areas affected by an intense and prolonged heatwave.

title: Cluster bombs could turn the war in Ukraine's favor — but Russia says it's ready to use them too
description: Russian President Vladimir Putin warned Moscow has a "sufficient reserve" of cluster munitions and reserves the right to use the weapons in tit-for-tat actions.

title: Russia says it will not extend the landmark Ukraine grain deal
description: A pact facilitating the export of key Ukrainian grains to the global markets was set to expire on Monday.

title: Two Singapore lawmakers resign after admitting to 'inappropriate relationship'
description: Two lawmakers from the ruling PAP resigned Monday after admitting to an "inappropriate relationship" with each other.

title: Crimea bridge hit by explosions; Russia-backed authorities slam Ukraine for 'terrorist attack'
description: The bridge, a 12-mile crossing of road and railways, is a crucial transportation and supply route for Russian forces in Ukraine.

title: China property investment slide deepens in June as structural shift inflicts pain
description: The National Bureau of Statistics says the property sector is shifting from high-speed development to stable development in the medium to long term.

title: CNBC Daily Open: For banks, big profits don’t mean stock gains
description: Despite big banks posting solid earnings for their second quarter, they didn’t reap rewards in stock markets Friday.

title: Wagner's failed rebellion could hit the Kremlin's ambitions for a 'pro-Russian state' in Africa
description: Since the Wagner Group's aborted rebellion against the Russian military late last month, a cloud of uncertainty has hovered over the mercenary force's operations around the world.

title: A.I. is a $1 trillion investment opportunity but will be 'biggest bubble of all time,' CEO predicts
description: Speaking with UBS analysts on a call last week, Stability AI CEO Emad Mostaque said of AI: "I think this will be the biggest bubble of all time."

title: Ripple says U.S. banks will want to use XRP cryptocurrency after partial victory in SEC fight
description: Ripple is confident U.S. banks will want to use its XRP cryptocurrency for cross-border transactions after a judge gave it a partial victory over the SEC.

title: Gig workers are ‘here to stay': Singapore minister on why they shouldn't be left behind
description: Speaking to CNBC, Koh Poh Koon said that gig workers should not be "lagging behind the rest of the population in terms of their longer term needs."

title: China reports second-quarter GDP miss, another record high in youth unemployment
description: Analysts expect a faster pace than the first quarter, but it comes off a low base due to the lockdowns in Shanghai in April and May last year.

title: Singapore's workers want to stay remote, but employers are backtracking on flexibility
description: While working professionals remain "keenly interested" in remote work, employers have been far less likely to mention "work from home" in postings, said Indeed Singapore.
